@markgoho Hello Mark! It‚Äôs fine if an employer asks employees to leave reviews. But it‚Äôs NOT fine to coerce folks into leaving positive feedback. We stand behind an employee‚Äôs right to have an independent voice, so if you suspect something‚Äôs up, email us at content@glassdoor.com. -Nikki

@Gingercappe Hello there! Employers can ask employees to submit reviews‚Äîbut per our Community Guidelines, they CAN‚ÄôT force people into leaving positive feedback. (They can‚Äôt alter or remove reviews, either.) If you think that‚Äôs happening, please email us at content@glassdoor.com. -Nikki
